Lots of bugs and rather than fix the bad parts of the game design and RNG that enables the toxic, the unfun, or the unhealthy mechanics of the game, the devs rather just call it all "strategy". The game studio ignores the input from everyone; whether surv main or killer main.  Game has great potential but the other four people in the lobby can ruin the round easily. And because people suck, they often do. Devs could've removed/added a lot lo these past 5 years to mitigate player griefing. Or better yet, not incorporated griefing in as a play style.

[h1]DED BY DISCONNECT[/h1]

So by now you all know what Dead by daylight is.

Simply put, its [i]like[/i] hide and seek [b]but..[/b] you gotta do some additional stuff on top of trying not to get tagged by a gaggle of killers. You may or may not [u]survive[/u] the last bit.

The graphics are alright, could probably use a bit more atmospheric fog here and there.
They do a good job of setting the tone for what you're in for...[i]most of the time.[/i]
The models and animations are pretty cool but some of them kind of feel dated.

That is understandable because the game came out in [b]2016.[/b]
In fact, I first heard of this because of a [b]PAYDAY 2[/b] Collaboration thing
where they gave you Trapper™'s mask if you followed the game on steam. 

It really didn't seem like my type of game at first. It took a few years and some friends
to convince me it was worth a decent college try. 

Suffice it to say, [u]I'm glad I did![/u]

The character roster is pretty good and it is getting better. Licensed movie and game killers / survivors added to the mix make it feel like this game is like Smash Bros but for horror themed murder hide-n-seek.

Have you ever wanted to see if [b]Ash™[/b] (Evil Dead) could survive an encounter with [b]Michael Myers™[/b] (Halloween)?

Have you ever wanted to [b]Nemesis™[/b] (Resident Evil) in [b]Haddonfield™[/b] (Halloween) punching the lights out of peeps?

[h1][b]WELL YOU CAN HAVE THAT HERE.[/b][/h1]

There are a lot of iconic horror movie characters the devs could put in the game and that idea alone excites me. Don't get me wrong, their original characters are great too. They have some very creative killers on the roster as well as survivors.

BUT I LOVE PLAYING AS [u]ASH.[/u]

Anyway, sound design is great too.
Gets the blood pumping as you try to hide and listen in.

Listen for the "Terror Radius" or that tell tale heartbeat sound.
Listen for the sound of footsteps.
Listen for the sounds of someone gasping in pain.
Listen for the sounds of someone bleeding out.
[strike]Listen for the sounds of the killer getting really really close to where you were hiding just now.[/strike]

[b]Too late, he found you.[/b]

Game times can range from short quick sessions to pulse pounding but somewhat moderate. 
Queue times depend on region and time, so if you aren't picky about which one you wanna be (killer or survivor) you'll find a game fairly quickly. Though new DLC survivor/killers could influence that a little bit, so keep that in mind.

As with any online game, you'll see a fair amount of peeps disconnecting.
This is usually cause they get matched with a really good killer or a really good set of survivors. I've played with some peeps that flat out disconnect when they reach a specific map or get a specific killer when they play survivor.

There are a ton of cosmetics as well if you wanna really make a unique looking killer but they'll cost you some in-game currency but some of them are locked behind premium currency.

[b]Hey drip don't come [i]cheap[/i], my dudes.[/b] 

but if it makes you feel any better, you can use the same currency to unlock DLC survivors without getting their DLC on steam itself. I wouldn't do it personally but the option is there for people that want to.


Overall, I give this game an 8/10
Pretty good for what it is. Do a few games, 20-30 min bursts and come back whenever.
You won't feel too bad even if you lose. Buy it on sale if you don't wanna pony up $10+

Ash Williams was an automatic buy for me as far as DLC is concerned.

TLDR: fun but sadly grindy, buggy and devs wont listen. 

You will see that I have many hours in this game, and after writing this the hours will more likely than not go up more and more. So why I do not recommend this game?

Dbd is fun but the fun goes away as soon as you wish to play more often and level up to get the perks. The core of the game is perks, each killer and survivor has 3. You can level them up to unlock slots and later on, for other killers and survivors in a system called the blood web. This system was fine when the game rooster was small but now it way bigger and now dbd has a big grind problem. The bloodweb system has a lot of rng in it that make you waste blood points (you earn these from playing in matches) to the point that you can waste over 1 mil BPs that take hours and hours to gain only to waste them in less than few mins and hardly get perks you want/need yet alone all of them.

The next point. Someone in the subreddit posted daily about how the game has no color blind options but no updates about that until a journalist wrote about a dev talking about badly in a stream when asked about it.

Now the content. DBD gets dlc every few months and the last few ones been broken and buggy. They also just add to the grind. 

So if you wish to play this game all the power to you. But do not invest to much on it time wise or make it your main game.
How to understand that your friends are masochists? It's simple, you will find this game in their library and they played it for more than 6 hours.

Well kid the world is unfair,

So yeah its worth the purchase, but dont take it srsly, and Enjoy the End game Chat, (:

キラーのみをやっているプレイヤーです。主にキラーのことを書いておきます。
様々な能力をもったキラーがおり、大体の人なら自分に合うキラーが見つかると思います。ただ、サバイバーもキラーも半分以上(約3分の２)のキャラクターがDLCを買わないと解放できず、強いパークも基本的にDLCのキャラが持っているので買うのはほぼ必須だと思います。ただ、週１で更新される聖堂というものでDLCのキャラのパークをゲットできる可能性はあるので気長に待つのもありだと思います。
その代わりかはわかりませんが、DLCは定期的にセールが来るのでそのタイミングでめぼしいDLCを買うのが一番いいと思います。
キラーをやろうとしている人に注意しておきたいのが、煽ってくるサバイバーが多いです。全員が煽ってくるというわけではありませんが、まあまあな確率で煽ってきます。
あと注意しておきたいのが、マッチングがガバガバです。キラーとサバイバーにはそれぞれランクがあって、数字が小さいほどランクが高いのですが、ランク１３のキラーに対してランク４～９のサバイバーが２、３人という感じになることが多いです。酷いときは、ランク１３に対して全員ランク１～３という感じになります。
長々と書きましたが、まとめるとイライラしやすい人はやらない方がいいです。あまり深く考えず気楽にできる人にはおススメです。

On the other hand ,you can play solo queue , prepare for countless nights of crying and countless nights in fetal position.

Lemme make this as clear as possible:

I'd actually recommend it due to it actually being a fun game in general, especially if you have friends who play it as well. 

The reason I'm not giving a positive review is because of the community (shocker). It's nothing new that the ranking system is trash, but for some reason when you reach purple ranks, and this goes for both killers and survivors, the toxicity skyrockets. Gray ranks and green ranks is where everyone is fine and nice but once you enter purple ranks, especially as a killer main, you'll notice a swift change in survivors behaviour, mainly that they'll be way more toxic in chat, teabag and flashlight spam. This is even more common with SWF (Survive With Friends) groups since they get cocky and think they're invincible. 

For killers it doesn't change as much, they mostly just tunnel and facecamp (since they cant do much else). Of course this leaves an opportunity for other survivors do repair generators but it's not so fun to be the guy on the hook. 

In summary, survivors are toxic and killers suffer more than them. If you're going to get DBD, make sure you have some friends who play it so you dont have to get flamed for nothing. Also, I suggest not trying to rank up as a killer, it's not worth it.
yes, its a very competitive game that is not forgiving but if your able to stand bullys and have a fun time then this game is amazing. it is for me a least.

Edit: WARNING! Apparently there's an issue where your IP address is leaked to everyone in the match. So someone can DDOS you specifically, and one streamer so far at least has been Swatted because of the IP leaks.

Play a survivor, get on discord (avoiding a crucial aspect of the game) and then cry "sweaty killer" when they tunnel and camp you. That's the extent of this game. 

Then there's the most fun bit! Where those same survivors using Discord are running full tier 3 perks from every survivor in the game while new players get to start with a wopping 3 perks that you CAN'T EVEN USE because you only get one perk slot to start. Meanwhile those survivors with tier 3 perks can use FOUR at a time! And then they DC when they're on their third hook.

For a game that's been out as long as it has, it sure does make it as unfun as possible to be a new player. And for a game so heavily dependent on visual queues the graphics are muddy and washed out.

Edit: After two weeks of playing on and off i can say the main issue with the game is an abundance of survivors don't understand what "isometric" means outside of hair trends. They've grown entitled and expect to survive EVERY SINGLE MATCH. And that's just now how the game is intended to play out.

Ein sehr taktisches Spiel, sowohl mit Freunden im Multiplayer als Surviver als auch als Killer solo oder natürlich mit Randoms Solo. Es gibt viele Verschiedene Maps die mit Details sehr spannend gehalten werden und auch viele Killer und Surviver mit denen man spielen kann und jeder ist auf seine Weise besonders.
Sehr zu Empfehlen, ob für eine schnelle Runde oder auch einen ausgelassenen Spieleabend.
